name: Labyrinthe (Hephep team itch.io page - Welcome!)
description:
A simple maze running game. Maze are generated randomly. I did this to entertain my son as well as for practicing on algorithm and Godot engine. It's still evolving as I try more and more features, but it will always be intended to be played by kids.

Based on a true story.

(There is no sound yet)
